name: Ananya Sharma
title: Founder & Lead Teacher
bio: E-RYT 500 certified with 15 years of practice. Trained in Rishikesh, specializing in Hatha and Vinyasa.

name: Deepak Menon
title: Meditation & Breathwork
bio: Vipassana practitioner for 20 years. Guides students through transformative meditation journeys.

name: Priya Krishnan
title: Yin & Restorative Specialist
bio: Focuses on the healing aspects of yoga. Trained in Thailand and Bali.

name: Arjun Nair
title: Power & Vinyasa Teacher
bio: Former athlete bringing energy and alignment focus to dynamic practices.
